程序包 game.actors

类 Player

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.actors.Player
所有已实现的接口:
DesignOSoulsAddOn, MarsAddOn, Capable, Printable, PlayerInterface, Soul
public class Player
extends Actor
implements Soul, PlayerInterface
Class representing the Player on the gameMap.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明

    Estus Flask
    static int MAX_HEALTH_POTION
    max health potion that belongs to the whole player class something like game setting - players could have how many health potion

    Menu to show options on player's turn
    private int soul
    souls(money) the player has

    weapon that the player holds

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints)
      Constructor.
      参数:
      name - Name to call the player in the UI
      displayChar - Character to represent the player in the UI
      hitPoints - Player's starting number of hitPoints

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.
      指定者:
      playTurn 在类中 Actor
      参数:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      返回:
      the Action to be performed

    • getAllowableActions

      参数:

      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor

      返回:

    • subtractSouls

      参数:

      返回:

    • setSoul

      private boolean setSoul​(int soul)
      Setter for souls attribute if the parameter is valid, set soul with the number. Otherwise, set it to 0 as default.
      参数:
      soul - the value(int) of souls that should be set
      返回:
      boolean value to judge if the parameter is valid

    • hurt

      public void hurt​(int points)
      Do some damage to the player. But the hitPoints goes down to 0 at most If the player's hitpoints go down to zero, it will be knocked out.
      指定者:
      hurt 在接口中 PlayerInterface
      覆盖:
      hurt 在类中 Actor
      参数:
      points - number of hitpoints to deduct.
